articles.title: This Crewed Mission to Mars Goes Through Europe - BNN
articles.description: ESA is a low-key space agency critical to humans returning to the moon, which 53 years after Apollo 11 will be a way station for the red planet.
articles.content: (Bloomberg) -- Some of NASAs greatest missions have been in collaboration with ESA. Now, the European Space Agency is getting more ambitious. Its an essential partner to Americas National Aeronautics… [+377 chars]

articles.title: COVID-19 boosters help restore some protection against Omicron: EU drug regulator - CNA
articles.description:
The European Union's drug regulator said early data shows a booster dose of a COVID-19 vaccine helps restore some protection against the new Omicron variant, although there is no evidence yet that tweaks to existing shots will be necessary.
